title: Covid-19 State/Provincial Policy Tracker
description: The dataset provides the state/provincial-level (or equivalent first-level subdivisions) public health and social measures taken in eight countries: China, Japan, Korea, Russia, UK, Germany, US and Brazil, which cover different continents and approaches towards Covid-19. The dataset presents all the state/provincial-level policies in each country from the outbreak of Covid-19 up to Aug 15, 2020.
